file_content.text: I hope this office stops smelling like jungle carrion....
What... what is that disgusting stench? Oh, by the stars! What are you doing with all those rotting animal parts?
Er... no offense, my lord. I... I'm not sure what's going on.
I'm sure you have your reasons for bringing them here, sir. I'm hoping you'll share them with me.
Is this some sick joke? What the blazes is going on?
Why would you bring all these carcasses into my office?
The predators plaguing the work camp are no more.
The work camp is safe.
Wh--what? Oh! You mean... I just didn't expect anyone of your stature to collect on that bounty.
Your work camp had a problem. I was the solution.
I'm displaying my power.
Oh! Of--of course, my lord. You're here to collect the bounty, yes?
The next time a work camp requests help, send it.
I'm doing your dirty work.
I--I understand, sir. Rest assured, we'll attend to such matters directly from now on.
You asked for jungle predators. I'm delivering them.
It's proof I did my job.
We asked for proof, not a slaughterhouse. Really, you hunters are simply uncouth.
You requested these.
You did this for the bounty on jungle predators? I... I didn't expect anyone to be this... thorough.
Give me my reward.
This is about that bounty? You must all be quite skilled to have slaughtered all these creatures.
This is about that bounty? You must be amazingly well trained to have slaughtered all these creatures by yourself.
The Empire is, uh, grateful for the extraordinary lengths you went to. Enjoy your reward.
I'll take these beast parts and put them... anywhere but here. Thank you for your help.
I'm sorry, but I can't see you without an appointment.
Excuse me, but I'm filing data requests from the Dark Council itself.
